item.title: My Favorite Resources for Learning Chinese
item.description: Here’s a bunch of links I found useful while learning Chinese! I know there’s a lot here, so I’ll start with my TOP 3 pleco - Absolutely essential dictionary for anyone studying Chinese. italki - Great for finding a chinese teacher (and at a decent price). hsk - You can choose any textbook series you like! I want to take the standard test some day so I use HSK.
